info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 1:03PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Siskiyou, northwestern Modoc and south central Klamath Counties through 145 PM PDT... At 102 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lava Beds National Monument, or 31 miles southeast of Klamath Falls, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tulelake, Lava Beds National Monument, Willow Valley Reservoir, Lorella, Newell and Malin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
